items.sentence: I\'m sure that Tom is just tired as you are.
I\'m sure that she will not come to see you.
You idiots are giving the school a bad name.
You look like a completely different person.
You may not remember me, but I remember you.
You need to hire an criminal defense lawyer.
I\'ve decided not to sing that song tonight.
I\'ve decided to give my old bicycle to Tom.
I\'ve decided to major in French in college.
I\'ve got a couple of announcements to make.
I used to often take walks along that river.
Just a second. This call might be important.
I didn\'t want to spend any more time alone.
I don\'t blame you for putting off our trip.
I don\'t feel that I can trust what he says.
I don\'t feel up to eating anything tonight.
You still don\'t know what happened, do you?
You used to have a crush on me, didn\'t you?
You went to the park yesterday, didn\'t you?
You won\'t believe what Tom just said to me.
Let\'s hope they don\'t even think about it.
Tom came close to being run over by a truck.
Tom\'s silence confirmed Mary\'s suspicions.
You should learn how to use your dictionary.
You should probably tell Tom how to do that.
Would you like a plastic bag or a paper bag?
You have to go outside if you want to smoke.
Does anybody here know how this thing works?
I spent two hours reading a book last night.
Tom and Mary get along well with each other.
Tom and Mary have three sons and a daughter.
I really don\'t understand why Tom did that.
I really should\'ve told Tom not to do that.
Tom is the one who can speak French, not me.
Tom is the one who puts the children to bed.
Tom is the one who taught Mary how to drive.
Tom is the one who told Mary not to do that.
Tom is the only one not invited to my party.
Tom took off his coat and put it on a chair.
Tom took the butter out of the refrigerator.
Tom tricked Mary into paying for his ticket.
Tom had a good reason for doing what he did.
Tom had a job interview yesterday afternoon.
Tom broke a rib when he fell off the ladder.
Tom\'s office is three miles from his house.
Tom\'s oldest daughter looks just like Mary.
Tom\'s parents caught him smoking marijuana.
Tom\'s parents have a bar in their basement.
Everybody in the picture is smiling happily.
Have you decided on a name yet for the baby?
